title: Tour de France Final Rest Day Reflections: Does Vingegaard Have It In Him?
content:
Breaking down where the GC contenders have won/lost time so far during a scorching fast Tour de France, and what it means for the race's final week.

Read the full article at Tour de France Final Rest Day Reflections: Does Vingegaard Have It In Him? on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
